subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: U.S. forward Jozy Altidore, who injured his hamstring in Monday’s victory against Ghana, will miss Sunday’s World Cup match against Portugal.
snippet: U.S. forward Jozy Altidore, who injured his hamstring in Monday’s victory against Ghana, will miss Sunday’s World Cup match against Portugal.
